snippet.title: Loathful Trailer 1
snippet.description:
Wishlist Loathful on steam 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1950200/Loathful/ 
https://twitter.com/fazerdoo


 Loathful is a Survival Horror in first person with PS1 graphics. Bring yourself in a retro-style adventure where all your nightmares are brought to life. Survive your demons, dive into your darkest fears to overthrow a mysterious virus who seems to have put his hands on this universe.
